com.kpro.datastorage
Class PolicyDatabase

java.lang.Object
  com.kpro.datastorage.PolicyDatabase
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Iterable<PolicyObject>
Direct Known Subclasses:
PDatabase
public abstract class PolicyDatabase
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Iterable<PolicyObject>

This is abstract class for databases. All policy databases must implement this interface. Auto-generated via eclipse from PDatabase.java, then made abstract. Does enforce singleton-ness here. need to do it in each subclass.

Version:
29.09.11.1
Author:
ngerstle

closeDB

public void closeDB()
calls closeDB(PolicyDatabase.outlocation). needed due to lack of a good destructor system, as far as java goes (according to google)
